content: I absolutely agree with you. "amour" accurately portrays the complexities of the aging process and highlights the importance of cherishing and valuing the time we have with our loved ones. by confronting the realities of aging and mortality, the film encourages viewers to have conversations about end-of-life care and to prioritize the emotional needs of dying people and their loved ones. this can lead to a more compassionate and understanding approach to aging and dying, which is crucial in a society that often values productivity and youth over everything else.
